title: Intro Malware Rev Eng
description: This course exposes students to an immersive, hands-on experience in the dissection and analysis of the code, structure, and functionality of malicious software.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 2035 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 2036 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 2200 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
